title: Why is there such a huge difference in disenchant value and the upgrade of a shard?

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
I think I spend a decent amount on this game; I buy bundles during events, boosts, skins on sale, I bought the 2 gemstone Icons to get a Lancer Zero skin, I have over 80 skins.

I just have to say that the ratio between disenchanting and upgrading skin shards is enormous. I just bought a 5 hextech bundle and opened 5 Champ shards totaling 3800 BE and 2 skins worth 465!!! OE. Legendary skin shards upgrades are 1520 ORANGE ESSENCE! And that shard only disenchants for 364... I can't even disenchant a legendary shard to upgrade a 750 RP skin shard. Epic shards only give 270 OE. That legendary shard upgrade is OVER 4 times more OE than what it disenchants for. 

If I was averaging 500 OE for every 5 chest bundle, I would have to pay 2925 RP to upgrade Zombie Brand.
Legendary skins only cost 1820.

replies.body: Keep in mind you can get all of this content for free by playing the game normally as well. Chests can be obtained by just playing the game and getting mastery chests, which can give you plenty of skin shards for free to disenchant.

I do play the game normally, I got all the mastery chests during the first week of the season and I still can not upgrade that legendary skin shard. The values are way too far apart, it needs to be fixed.
